active_skill.name: Knight, Bouncing Charge!
active_skill.description:
Jump repeatedly while riding Pale Bouncy and summon 3 Knight's Stars. When characters come into contact with Knight's Stars, they recover Energy.

Energy Generation
[1+Bangboo Level×0.01]/[1.1+Bangboo Level×0.01]/[1.2+Bangboo Level×0.01]/[1.3+Bangboo Level×0.01]/[1.4+Bangboo Level×0.01]

Cooldown 24s

additional_ability.name: Knight's Chivalry
additional_ability.description:
When there is at least one Support character in your squad: When characters come into contact with Knight's Stars, their ATK increases by [20+Bangboo Level×1.2]/[25+Bangboo Level×1.4]/[30+Bangboo Level×1.6]/[35+Bangboo Level×1.8]/[40+Bangboo Level×2]

Duration 10s.

chain_attack.name: Knight, Bouncing Charge!
chain_attack.description:
Summons 3 Pale Bouncys which stomp up to 10 times in the area ahead, each time dealing Ether DMG to enemies within its attack range.

DMG Multiplier:
129%/137%/146%/154%/163%

Daze Multiplier:
18%/19%/20%/21%/22%
